name: tag-jumper
description: Quickly jump between tags and attributes in HTML, HTX, JSX, and TSX files.

commands.title: Tag Jumper: Jump Forward Through Element Tags
Tag Jumper: Jump Backward Through Element Tags
Tag Jumper: Jump Forward Through Element Attributes
Tag Jumper: Jump Backward Through Element Attributes

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && (editorLangId == 'html' || editorLangId == 'htx' || editorLangId == 'jsx' || editorLangId == 'tsx' || editorLangId == 'xml' || editorLangId == 'xhtml' || editorLangId == 'javascriptreact' || editorLangId == 'typescriptreact')

editorTextFocus && (editorLangId == 'html' || editorLangId == 'htx' || editorLangId == 'jsx' || editorLangId == 'tsx' || editorLangId == 'xml' || editorLangId == 'xhtml' || editorLangId == 'javascriptreact' || editorLangId == 'typescriptreact')

editorTextFocus && (editorLangId == 'html' || editorLangId == 'htx' || editorLangId == 'jsx' || editorLangId == 'tsx' || editorLangId == 'xml' || editorLangId == 'xhtml' || editorLangId == 'javascriptreact' || editorLangId == 'typescriptreact')

editorTextFocus && (editorLangId == 'html' || editorLangId == 'htx' || editorLangId == 'jsx' || editorLangId == 'tsx' || editorLangId == 'xml' || editorLangId == 'xhtml' || editorLangId == 'javascriptreact' || editorLangId == 'typescriptreact')

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
